index.title: Luma Island - Dive into the Epic Adventure of Luma Island
index.description: Go on a epic journey in Luma Island. Build your dream home, master unique professions, and uncover the mysteries of this enchanting world with friends.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Luma Island
privacy.description: Privacy policy for Luma Island. Learn how we protect your information while you enjoy our cozy farming and adventure game.

blogentry.title: Luma Island Guide & Blog | Luma Island
blogentry.description: Explore the latest news and updates from Luma Island. Stay informed about the latest events, adventures, and community activities.

luma-island-professions.title: Luma Island Professions Guide | Luma Island
luma-island-professions.description: Discover the unique professions in Luma Island and their unique features, gameplay mechanics, and what kind of player they're best suited for.

luma-island-wiki.title: Luma Island Wiki | Luma Island
luma-island-wiki.description: All facts about Luma Island - learn about development background, gameplay mechanics, features, and connect with the community through our fan-made wiki.

cta.title: Begin Your Epic Adventure Today
cta.description: Ready to start your journey on Luma Island? Download now and join a community of adventurers!
